hero.title: TourEast Transport Group
hero.subtitle: Professional passenger transport: from individual airport transfers to group tours.

principles.title: Welcome to TourEast Transport Group
principles.description: We create comfortable and safe trips throughout Uzbekistan ‚Äî for those who value quality. TourEast Transport Group is your reliable partner in the world of premium transportation.

stats.title: TTGroup in Numbers
stats.description1: Our reliability and quality confirmed by facts. We are proud of our service and offer you the best conditions for comfortable and safe trips.
stats.description2: Our vehicle fleet is constantly updated, drivers undergo a strict selection process, and our service geography covers all popular tourist and business destinations in Uzbekistan.

fleetIntro.title: More than just transport. Your personal fleet in Uzbekistan.
fleetIntro.description: From agile sedans for city meetings to premium liners for large delegations. We have assembled the best fleet in the region to make your every trip flawless.

premium.name: Premium & VIP
premium.description: For business meetings and guests who value exclusive comfort.

comfort.name: Comfort & Standard
comfort.description: The optimal choice for daily trips and city tours.

minivans.name: Minivans
minivans.description: Ideal for family travel and small delegations.

buses.name: Buses
buses.description: Solutions for corporate outings, excursions, and large groups.

fresh.title: Modern Fleet
fresh.description: 90% of our fleet consists of 2023‚Äì2024 vehicles in perfect technical and external condition.

clean.title: Perfect Cleanliness
clean.description: We perform a comprehensive wash and interior dry cleaning before every trip. Smoking is not allowed in our cars.

comfort.title: Comfort in Any Weather
comfort.description: All vehicles are equipped with functioning climate control systems, ensuring coolness even in +40¬∞C.

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: Regular technical inspections, full insurance, and only experienced drivers with over 10 years of experience.

seo.title: For any tasks and routes
seo.description: We understand the difference between a tourist walk around Bukhara and an official delegation visit. That's why at TTGroup we offer flexible solutions: quick sedan booking in 15 minutes, logistics organization for conferences on Yutong buses, or premium support in a LiXiang L7. All transport is equipped for comfortable long-distance trips between cities in Uzbekistan.

fleet.title: Hits of Our Fleet
fleet.description: Discover the vehicles our clients choose most often. These models are the perfect combination of comfort, style, and reliability, tested by hundreds of trips on the roads of Uzbekistan.

notFound.title: Didn't find what you were looking for?
notFound.description: Our full fleet includes over 50 models. We will find the perfect option for any task ‚Äî from a business meeting to a large tourist tour.

testimonials.description: We are proud of the high level of our service. Find out what customers who have already used our services say.

t1.name: Alexey P.
t1.quote: Excellent service, new cars, polite drivers. I ordered a transfer for partners ‚Äî everyone was very satisfied. Definitely recommend!

t2.name: Maria K.
t2.quote: They helped with organizing a transfer for a large group. Everything was clear, on time, and at the highest level. The cars are clean, the drivers are professionals.

t3.name: John S.
t3.quote: The best airport transfer I've had. The driver met me with a sign, helped with luggage. The car was perfectly clean. Great start to my trip in Uzbekistan!

feedback.title: Your Opinion Matters
feedback.description: We value every review. Check out dozens of real ratings on popular platforms.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to the most popular questions about our services.

items.q1: What cars are in your fleet?
items.a1: Our fleet includes more than 50 vehicles of various classes: from standard sedans (Chevrolet Cobalt, Kia K5) to premium SUVs (LiXiang L7, Chevrolet Tahoe) and spacious minivans and buses (Hyundai Staria, Mercedes-Benz Sprinter, Yutong). We will select transport for any task.
items.a2: You can book a car by filling out the form on our website. Specify your name, phone number, desired date, and car. Our manager will contact you shortly to confirm and clarify the details. You can also contact us directly by phone or via Telegram.
items.q3: Do you provide airport transfer services?
items.a3: Yes, we provide a full range of transfer services from the airports of Tashkent, Samarkand, Bukhara, and other cities in Uzbekistan. Our drivers will meet you with a sign, help with luggage, and ensure a comfortable trip to your hotel or any other destination.
items.q4: Can I order a car with a driver for a trip between cities?
items.a4: Of course. We specialize in intercity transport throughout Uzbekistan. All our cars are equipped for comfortable long trips, and the drivers have extensive long-distance driving experience and know the routes perfectly.
items.q5: What payment methods do you accept?
items.a5: We accept various payment methods, including cash (Uzbek soms, US dollars), payment by bank card via a terminal, as well as bank transfers for legal entities. Please specify your preferred payment method when booking.

gallery.title: Uzbekistan from the window of a comfortable car
gallery.description: These are not just photos ‚Äî these are real shots from trips. See what your journey could be like: comfortable cars, scenic routes, and stops in the most beautiful places. Get inspired for your next trip.
